posts.text: "glazing" the data sounds like they're making it more delicious. I approve this new verb. Please, glaze your data.

reply_context.text: fun fact: in the AI biz, what you call "glazing" and think makes your data useless we call an "augmentation". it actually makes your data better. if the data is all the same the model tends to memorize it. if you vary it up in complicated ways the model has to learn how to make sense of it instead.
